name: Jerk's in the Hall
description:
Two stand-up comedians are about to give their first show, are you the jerk that comes here to screw them up, or are you sent by their company's boss to make sure they get some good laugh? It's up to you. Oh, don't mind those audiences. 

Week 2 assignment for Prototype Studio, NYU GC

Keywords: Chain Reaction

Instructor: Bennet Foddy
